content: This is a **list of [libraries](/wiki/Libraries) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**: ## National libraries These libraries are managed by the [National Library Board](/wiki/National_Library_Board). - [National Library, Singapore](/wiki/National_Library,_Singapore) - [Lee Kong Chian Reference Library](/wiki/National_Library,_Singapore#Lee_Kong_Chian_Reference_Library) - National Reference Library (former) ### Regional libraries - [Jurong Regional Library](/wiki/Jurong_Regional_Library) (former Jurong East Community Library) - [Punggol Regional Library](/wiki/Punggol_Regional_Library) - [Tampines Regional Library](/wiki/Tampines_Regional_Library) - [Woodlands Regional Library](/wiki/Woodlands_Regional_Library) ### Public libraries - [Ang Mo Kio Public Library](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_Public_Library) - [Bedok Public Library](/wiki/Bedok_Public_Library) - [Bishan Public Library](/wiki/Bishan_Public_Library) - [Bukit Batok Public Library](/wiki/Bukit_Batok_Public_Library) - [Bukit Panjang Public Library](/wiki/Bukit_Panjang_Public_Library) - [Central Arts Library](/wiki/Central_Arts_Library) - [Central Public Library](/wiki/National_Library,_Singapore) - [Cheng San Public Library](/wiki/Cheng_San_Public_Library) - [Choa Chu Kang Public Library](/wiki/Choa_Chu_Kang_Public_Library) - [Clementi Public Library](/wiki/Clementi_Public_Library) - [Geylang East Public Library](/wiki/Geylang_East_Public_Library) - [Jurong West Public Library](/wiki/Jurong_West_Public_Library) - [library@chinatown](/wiki/Library@chinatown) - [library@esplanade](/wiki/Library@esplanade) - [library@harbourfront](/wiki/Library@harbourfront) (Replaced Bukit Merah Public Library, opened in 2019) - [library@orchard](/wiki/Library@orchard) (Re-opened in 2014 at [Orchard Gateway](/wiki/Orchard_Gateway)) - [Marine Parade Public Library](/wiki/Marine_Parade_Public_Library) - [Pasir Ris Public Library](/wiki/Pasir_Ris_Public_Library) - [Queenstown Public Library](/wiki/Queenstown_Public_Library) - [Sembawang Public Library](/wiki/Sembawang_Public_Library) - [Serangoon Public Library](/wiki/Serangoon_Public_Library) - [Sengkang Public Library](/wiki/Sengkang_Public_Library) - [Toa Payoh Public Library](/wiki/Toa_Payoh_Public_Library) - [The LLiBrary](/wiki/The_LLiBrary) (a partnership between SkillsFuture SG and the National Library Board) - [Yishun Public Library](/wiki/Yishun_Public_Library) ## Private libraries ### Academic libraries - [Nanyang Technological University](/wiki/Nanyang_Technological_University) - Art, Design & Media Library - Business Library - Chinese Library - Communication & Information Library - Humanities & Social Sciences Library - Lee Wee Nam Library - Library Outpost - Medical Library - Wang Gungwu Library - [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore) - Central Library - C J Koh Law Library - [Hon Sui Sen Memorial Library](/wiki/Hon_Sui_Sen_Memorial_Library) - Medicine+Science Library - Music Library - Wan Boo Sow Chinese Library ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 雲茂潮中文图书馆) - Yale-NUS College Library - [Singapore Management University](/wiki/Singapore_Management_University) - Li Ka Shing Library - Kwa Geok Choo Law Library - [Singapore University of Technology and Design](/wiki/Singapore_University_of_Technology_and_Design) - SUTD Library - [Ngee Ann Polytechnic](/wiki/Ngee_Ann_Polytechnic) - Lien Ying Chow Library - [Republic Polytechnic](/wiki/Republic_Polytechnic) - [Republic Polytechnic Library](/wiki/Republic_Polytechnic_Library) - [Singapore Institute of Management](/wiki/Singapore_Institute_of_Management) - Tay Eng Soon Library - [Singapore Polytechnic](/wiki/Singapore_Polytechnic) - Main Library - [Nanyang Polytechnic](/wiki/Nanyang_Polytechnic) - Nanyang Polytechnic Library - [Temasek Polytechnic](/wiki/Temasek_Polytechnic) - Temasek Polytechnic Library - [Buddhist Library](/wiki/Buddhist_Library) - Buddhist Library in Aljunied - [United Chinese Library (Singapore)](/wiki/United_Chinese_Library_(Singapore)) ### Specialist libraries - [SAFTI Military Institute](/wiki/SAFTI_Military_Institute) - SAFTI Military Institute Library - [Singapore Botanic Gardens](/wiki/Singapore_Botanic_Gardens) - Library of Botany and Horticulture - [Singapore Sports Hub](/wiki/Singapore_Sports_Hub) - Sports Hub Library - National Library Board Libraries
title: List of libraries in Singapore
